<h3 id="X26487">X(26487) = ENDO-HOMOTHETIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: 1st JOHNSON-YFF AND X3-ABC REFLECTIONS</h3>
Barycentrics<br>
a^7-(b+c)*a^6-(3*b^2+2*b*c+3*c^2)*a^5+3*(b^2+c^2)*(b+c)*a^4+(3*b^4-2*b^2*c^2+3*c^4)*a^3-(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*(3*b^2+4*b*c+3*c^2)*a^2-(b^2-c^2)^2*(b-c)^2*a+(b^2-c^2)^3*(b-c)  :  :
<p>X(26487) lies on these lines:
{1,6863}, {2,355}, {3,12}, {4,10585}, {5,1001}, {8,6853}, {11,16202}, {20,10599}, {24,11391}, {30,10894}, {35,6923}, {36,18962}, {40,3584}, {55,6842}, {56,10954}, {72,5552}, {100,6937}, {119,405}, {125,12890}, {140,958}, {182,12587}, {226,15865}, {381,6253}, {388,6954}, {442,11499}, {495,11249}, {499,10246}, {515,6862}, {517,3085}, {527,6684}, {549,11236}, {581,17734}, {631,3436}, {946,10197}, {952,26363}, {1006,11681}, {1125,6959}, {1317,15868}, {1329,6883}, {1479,6980}, {1482,10056}, {1511,13214}, {1621,6941}, {1656,18518}, {1698,17857}, {1788,5885}, {1837,24299}, {2080,10795}, {2476,11491}, {2646,10320}, {3035,15843}, {3058,11928}, {3086,15178}, {3311,19025}, {3312,19026}, {3357,12930}, {3475,6583}, {3523,20067}, {3526,6713}, {3541,5130}, {3560,6690}, {3576,6958}, {3579,5714}, {3616,6949}, {3822,6796}, {4294,6982}, {4309,10738}, {4428,10893}, {4995,11826}, {5080,6875}, {5218,6850}, {5230,5396}, {5248,6929}, {5284,6975}, {5433,10955}, {5445,15016}, {5534,5705}, {5587,6861}, {5603,6960}, {5690,12635}, {5709,15298}, {5731,6952}, {5770,5791}, {5790,19854}, {5886,6834}, {6256,6914}, {6642,10830}, {6771,12932}, {6774,12931}, {6824,18480}, {6827,10588}, {6833,18481}, {6838,12699}, {6848,9955}, {6868,10590}, {6891,13624}, {6892,12667}, {6897,10522}, {6907,11248}, {6910,12115}, {6911,25466}, {6926,17502}, {6928,7951}, {6933,12116}, {6944,11230}, {6962,10532}, {6967,18857}, {6985,7680}, {6988,8164}, {7483,22758}, {7491,10895}, {7583,13896}, {7584,13953}, {9780,9803}, {10202,24914}, {10321,24929}, {10610,12936}, {10679,15908}, {10680,15888}, {10872,26316}, {10921,26341}, {10922,26348}, {11904,26451}, {12041,12372}, {12042,12183}, {12359,12423}, {14450,16139}, {17615,18856}, {17718,24474}, {26389,26398}, {26413,26422}, {26483,26498}, {26484,26507}, {26485,26516}, {26486,26521}</p>
<p>
X(26487) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {3, 9654}, {3085, 6825}<br>
X(26487) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (2, 1385, 26492), (2, 10786, 355)<br>
